scripts.deploy: npm run build && sam deploy --config-env test --no-confirm-changeset --region eu-west-1 && npm run export_outputs
scripts.deploy:localstack: npm run build:localstack && samlocal deploy --config-env test --no-confirm-changeset --region eu-west-1 && npm run export_outputs
scripts.export_outputs: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name lld-test-sam-basic --output json --query Stacks[0].Outputs > sam-outputs.json
